soen6441.team01.warzone.model

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Warzone MVC main controller. Manages the coordination and progression of the different stages of the game. As well as supporting user actions (ie. interactions, gestures).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEngine()
      Constructor with no views or models defined.
      GameEngine(SoftwareFactoryModel p_model_factory, SoftwareFactoryView p_view_factory, SoftwareFactoryController p_controller_factory)
      Constructor with view and models defined.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Startup and process the game startup phase of the game

      Startup and process the game startup phase of the game

      Startup and process the map editor phase of the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine()
        Constructor with no views or models defined. Use Software factory with defaults

      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine(SoftwareFactoryModel p_model_factory,
                  SoftwareFactoryView p_view_factory,
                  SoftwareFactoryController p_controller_factory)
        Constructor with view and models defined. Parameters passed as null will result in the default view or model being used.
        Parameters:
        p_model_factory - predefined SoftwareFactoryModel. Pass null to have the controller generate a model factory based on the default models.
        p_view_factory - predefined SoftwareFactoryView. Pass null to have the controller generate a view factory based on the default views (i.e. console based).
        p_controller_factory - predefined SoftwareFactoryController. Pass null to have the controller generate a controller factory based on the default controllers (i.e. console based).

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame()
        Starts executing the game dynamics

      • processMapEditor

        public boolean processMapEditor()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Startup and process the map editor phase of the game
        Returns:
        true=continue game; false=exit game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected errors
